name: Canis Alces
description:
Temperatures are dropping and leaves are falling. It's hunting season. A moose and his ex-hunting dog friend must work together to survive. In this two-player top-down tactical shooter, players control Moose and Dog and take on two drastically different roles.

Canis Alces is a 2-player co-op where the players must work together in order to survive the hunters trying to take them down. One plays as a moose with a gun who's job is to protect him and his friend (Dog), while the other plays as Dog, who's job is to provide support to Moose by healing him or giving him ammo. 

This game requires a mouse, keyboard, and controller.

Developers:

Andrea Belangdal, Cole Scott, Mayyan Baatish, Samantha Benavides, James Conger, Darshan Jayamohan
